recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
recipes.description: A healthy and colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried with a light soy sauce.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic American cookies loaded with gooey chocolate chips.

recipes.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy pasta dish made with tender chicken and Alfredo sauce.

recipes.name: Mango Salsa Chicken
recipes.description: Grilled chicken topped with a fresh and tangy mango salsa.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
recipes.description: A nutritious salad made with quinoa, avocado, and fresh vegetables.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
recipes.description: Toasted bread topped with a mixture of fresh tomatoes, basil, and olive oil.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Tender beef stir-fried with broccoli in a savory sauce.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
recipes.description: Pasta tossed with shrimp in a garlic butter and white wine sauce.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: A fragrant rice dish made with basmati rice, spices, and tender chicken pieces. Perfect for special occasions.

recipes.name: Chicken Karahi
recipes.description: A flavorful Pakistani dish made with chicken, tomatoes, and green chilies, cooked in a wok-like pan called a karahi.

recipes.name: Aloo Keema
recipes.description: A comforting dish made with minced meat (keema) and potatoes (aloo), seasoned with aromatic spices.

recipes.name: Chapli Kebabs
recipes.description: Spicy minced meat patties from Pakistan, flavored with a variety of spices and herbs, perfect as a starter or snack.

recipes.name: Saag (Spinach) with Makki di Roti
recipes.description: A traditional Punjabi dish made with mustard greens and spinach, served with cornmeal flatbread.

recipes.name: Japanese Ramen Soup
recipes.description: A Japanese noodle soup with a rich, flavorful broth, served with various toppings like pork, nori, and scallions.

recipes.name: Moroccan Chickpea Tagine
recipes.description: A Moroccan stew made with chickpeas, vegetables, and spices, slow-cooked to perfection.

recipes.name: Korean Bibimbap
recipes.description: A Korean rice dish served with mixed vegetables, beef, a fried egg, and a spicy gochujang sauce.

recipes.name: Greek Moussaka
recipes.description: A Greek casserole made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and béchamel sauce, baked until golden.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
recipes.description: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken cooked in a creamy tomato sauce.

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: A flavorful Thai curry made with green curry paste, coconut milk, and vegetables.

recipes.name: Mango Lassi
recipes.description: A refreshing Indian drink made with mango pulp, yogurt, and a touch of cardamom.

recipes.name: Italian Tiramisu
recipes.description: A classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

recipes.name: Turkish Kebabs
recipes.description: Grilled meat skewers marinated with Turkish spices, served with pita bread.

recipes.name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy smoothie made with fresh blueberries, bananas, and yogurt.

recipes.name: Mexican Street Corn (Elote)
recipes.description: Grilled corn on the cob topped with a creamy, spicy sauce and crumbled cheese.

recipes.name: Russian Borscht
recipes.description: A hearty beet soup from Russia, often served with sour cream.

recipes.name: South Indian Masala Dosa
recipes.description: A crispy crepe made from fermented rice batter, filled with a spicy potato filling.

recipes.name: Lebanese Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: A wrap filled with crispy falafel, fresh vegetables, and tahini sauce.

recipes.name: Brazilian Caipirinha
recipes.description: A refreshing Brazilian cocktail made with cachaça, lime, and sugar.
